directions: Cream butter or margarine with sugar.  Add applesauce; beat well.  Stir in flour, soda, and spices.  Add nuts and raisins.
Pour the batter into a greased and floured 8 inch square pan.  Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 40 minutes, or until done.  Serve warm.
title: Applesauce Cake I
